English.Text: Isabel puts the barrel down, stabbing her bootknife in to plug the hole. "Then you are against the Pyrphorians. I heard reports they tried to stop you with an iron dragon." She exhales nervously. "I did not believe it. And yet, you have risked your life to come here..." Isabel motions her guards to release you, "...I should at least hear what you are planning to do about all this."
